In<S>1722</S> the beginning<S>746</S> was<S>2258</S> the Word<S>3056</S>, and<S>2532</S> the Word<S>3056</S> was<S>2258</S> with<S>4314</S> God<S>2316</S>, and<S>2532</S> the Word<S>3056</S> was<S>2258</S> God<S>2316</S>.
The same<S>3778</S> was<S>2258</S> in<S>1722</S> the beginning<S>746</S> with<S>4314</S> God<S>2316</S>.
All things<S>3956</S> were made<S>1096</S> by<S>1223</S> him<S>846</S>; and<S>2532</S> without<S>5565</S> him<S>846</S> was<S>1096</S> not<S>3761</S> any thing<S>1520</S> made<S>1096</S> that<S>3739</S> was made<S>1096</S>.
In<S>1722</S> him<S>846</S> was<S>2258</S> life<S>2222</S>; and<S>2532</S> the life<S>2222</S> was<S>2258</S> the light<S>5457</S> of men<S>444</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the light<S>5457</S> shineth<S>5316</S> in<S>1722</S> darkness<S>4653</S>; and<S>2532</S> the darkness<S>4653</S> comprehended<S>2638</S> it<S>846</S> not<S>3756</S>. <sup>comprehended: or, did not admit, or, receive</sup>
There was<S>1096</S> a man<S>444</S> sent<S>649</S> from<S>3844</S> God<S>2316</S>, whose<S>846</S> name<S>3686</S> was John<S>2491</S>.
The same<S>3778</S> came<S>2064</S> for<S>1519</S> a witness<S>3141</S>, to<S>2443</S> bear witness<S>3140</S> of<S>4012</S> the Light<S>5457</S>, that<S>2443</S> all<S>3956</S> men through<S>1223</S> him<S>846</S> might believe<S>4100</S>.
He was<S>2258</S> not<S>3756</S> that<S>1565</S> Light<S>5457</S>, but<S>235</S> was sent to<S>2443</S> bear witness<S>3140</S> of<S>4012</S> that Light<S>5457</S>.
That was<S>2258</S> the true<S>228</S> Light<S>5457</S>, which<S>3739</S> lighteth<S>5461</S> every man<S>3956</S> <S>444</S> that cometh<S>2064</S> into<S>1519</S> the world<S>2889</S>.
He was<S>2258</S> in<S>1722</S> the world<S>2889</S>, and<S>2532</S> the world<S>2889</S> was made<S>1096</S> by<S>1223</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> the world<S>2889</S> knew<S>1097</S> him<S>846</S> not<S>3756</S>.
He came<S>2064</S> unto<S>1519</S> his own<S>2398</S>, and<S>2532</S> his own<S>2398</S> received<S>3880</S> him<S>846</S> not<S>3756</S>.
But<S>1161</S> as many as<S>3745</S> received<S>2983</S> him<S>846</S>, to them<S>846</S> gave he<S>1325</S> power<S>1849</S> to become<S>1096</S> the sons<S>5043</S> of God<S>2316</S>, even to them that believe<S>4100</S> on<S>1519</S> his<S>846</S> name<S>3686</S>: <sup>power: or, the right, or, privilege</sup>
Which<S>3739</S> were born<S>1080</S>, not<S>3756</S> of<S>1537</S> blood<S>129</S>, nor<S>3761</S> of<S>1537</S> the will<S>2307</S> of the flesh<S>4561</S>, nor<S>3761</S> of<S>1537</S> the will<S>2307</S> of man<S>435</S>, but<S>235</S> of<S>1537</S> God<S>2316</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the Word<S>3056</S> was made<S>1096</S> flesh<S>4561</S>, and<S>2532</S> dwelt<S>4637</S> among<S>1722</S> us<S>2254</S>, (and<S>2532</S> we beheld<S>2300</S> his<S>846</S> glory<S>1391</S>, the glory<S>1391</S> as<S>5613</S> of the only begotten<S>3439</S> of<S>3844</S> the Father<S>3962</S>,) full<S>4134</S> of grace<S>5485</S> and<S>2532</S> truth<S>225</S>.
John<S>2491</S> bare witness<S>3140</S> of<S>4012</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> cried<S>2896</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, This<S>3778</S> was he<S>2258</S> of whom<S>3739</S> I spake<S>2036</S>, He that cometh<S>2064</S> after<S>3694</S> me<S>3450</S> is preferred<S>1096</S> before<S>1715</S> me<S>3450</S>: for<S>3754</S> he was<S>2258</S> before<S>4413</S> me<S>3450</S>.
And<S>2532</S> of<S>1537</S> his<S>846</S> fulness<S>4138</S> have<S>2983</S> all<S>3956</S> we<S>2249</S> received<S>2983</S>, and<S>2532</S> grace<S>5485</S> for<S>473</S> grace<S>5485</S>.
For<S>3754</S> the law<S>3551</S> was given<S>1325</S> by<S>1223</S> Moses<S>3475</S>, but grace<S>5485</S> and<S>2532</S> truth<S>225</S> came<S>1096</S> by<S>1223</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>.
No man<S>3762</S> hath seen<S>3708</S> God<S>2316</S> at any time<S>4455</S>; the only begotten<S>3439</S> Son<S>5207</S>, which<S>3588</S> is<S>5607</S> in<S>1519</S> the bosom<S>2859</S> of the Father<S>3962</S>, he<S>1565</S> hath declared<S>1834</S> him.
And<S>2532</S> this<S>3778</S> is<S>2076</S> the record<S>3141</S> of John<S>2491</S>, when<S>3753</S> the Jews<S>2453</S> sent<S>649</S> priests<S>2409</S> and<S>2532</S> Levites<S>3019</S> from<S>1537</S> Jerusalem<S>2414</S> to<S>2443</S> ask<S>2065</S> him<S>846</S>, Who<S>5101</S> art<S>1488</S> thou<S>4771</S>?
And<S>2532</S> he confessed<S>3670</S>, and<S>2532</S> denied<S>720</S> not<S>3756</S>; but<S>2532</S> confessed<S>3670</S>,<S>3754</S> I<S>1473</S> am<S>1510</S> not<S>3756</S> the Christ<S>5547</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they asked<S>2065</S> him<S>846</S>, What<S>5101</S> then<S>3767</S>? Art<S>1488</S> thou<S>4771</S> Elias<S>2243</S>? And<S>2532</S> he saith<S>3004</S>, I am<S>1510</S> not<S>3756</S>. Art<S>1488</S> thou<S>4771</S> that prophet<S>4396</S>? And<S>2532</S> he answered<S>611</S>, No<S>3756</S>. <sup>that prophet: or, a prophet?</sup>
Then<S>3767</S> said they<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Who<S>5101</S> art thou<S>1488</S>? that<S>2443</S> we may give<S>1325</S> an answer<S>612</S> to them that sent<S>3992</S> us<S>2248</S>. What<S>5101</S> sayest thou<S>3004</S> of<S>4012</S> thyself<S>4572</S>?
He said<S>5346</S>, I<S>1473</S> am the voice<S>5456</S> of one crying<S>994</S> in<S>1722</S> the wilderness<S>2048</S>, Make straight<S>2116</S> the way<S>3598</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S>, as<S>2531</S> said<S>2036</S> the prophet<S>4396</S> Esaias<S>2268</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they which<S>3588</S> were sent<S>649</S> were<S>2258</S> of<S>1537</S> the Pharisees<S>5330</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they asked<S>2065</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Why<S>5101</S> baptizest thou<S>907</S> then<S>3767</S>, if<S>1487</S> thou<S>4771</S> be<S>1488</S> not<S>3756</S> that Christ<S>5547</S>, nor<S>3777</S> Elias<S>2243</S>, neither<S>3777</S> that prophet<S>4396</S>?
John<S>2491</S> answered<S>611</S> them<S>846</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, I<S>1473</S> baptize<S>907</S> with<S>1722</S> water<S>5204</S>: but<S>1161</S> there standeth one<S>2476</S> among<S>3319</S> you<S>5216</S>, whom<S>3739</S> ye<S>5210</S> know<S>1492</S> not<S>3756</S>;
He<S>846</S> it is<S>2076</S>, who<S>3739</S> coming<S>2064</S> after<S>3694</S> me<S>3450</S> is preferred<S>1096</S> before<S>1715</S> me<S>3450</S>, whose<S>3739</S> <S>846</S> shoe's<S>5266</S> latchet<S>2438</S> I<S>1473</S> am<S>1510</S> not<S>3756</S> worthy<S>514</S> to<S>2443</S> unloose<S>3089</S>.
These things<S>5023</S> were done<S>1096</S> in<S>1722</S> Bethabara<S>962</S> beyond<S>4008</S> Jordan<S>2446</S>, where<S>3699</S> John<S>2491</S> was<S>2258</S> baptizing<S>907</S>.
The next day<S>1887</S> John<S>2491</S> seeth<S>991</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> coming<S>2064</S> unto<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> saith<S>3004</S>, Behold<S>2396</S> the Lamb<S>286</S> of God<S>2316</S>, which<S>3588</S> taketh away<S>142</S> the sin<S>266</S> of the world<S>2889</S>. <sup>taketh away: or, beareth</sup>
This<S>3778</S> is he<S>2076</S> of<S>4012</S> whom<S>3739</S> I<S>1473</S> said<S>2036</S>, After<S>3694</S> me<S>3450</S> cometh<S>2064</S> a man<S>435</S> which<S>3739</S> is preferred<S>1096</S> before<S>1715</S> me<S>3450</S>: for<S>3754</S> he was<S>2258</S> before<S>4413</S> me<S>3450</S>.
And I<S>2504</S> knew<S>1492</S> him<S>846</S> not<S>3756</S>: but<S>235</S> that<S>2443</S> he should be made manifest<S>5319</S> to Israel<S>2474</S>, therefore<S>1223</S> <S>5124</S> am<S>2064</S> I<S>1473</S> come<S>2064</S> baptizing<S>907</S> with<S>1722</S> water<S>5204</S>.
And<S>2532</S> John<S>2491</S> bare record<S>3140</S>, saying<S>3004</S>,<S>3754</S> I saw<S>2300</S> the Spirit<S>4151</S> descending<S>2597</S> from<S>1537</S> heaven<S>3772</S> like<S>5616</S> a dove<S>4058</S>, and<S>2532</S> it abode<S>3306</S> upon<S>1909</S> him<S>846</S>.
And I<S>2504</S> knew<S>1492</S> him<S>846</S> not<S>3756</S>: but<S>235</S> he that sent<S>3992</S> me<S>3165</S> to baptize<S>907</S> with<S>1722</S> water<S>5204</S>, the same<S>1565</S> said<S>2036</S> unto me<S>3427</S>, Upon<S>1909</S> whom<S>3739</S> <S>302</S> thou shalt see<S>1492</S> the Spirit<S>4151</S> descending<S>2597</S>, and<S>2532</S> remaining<S>3306</S> on<S>1909</S> him<S>846</S>, the same<S>3778</S> is<S>2076</S> he which baptizeth<S>907</S> with<S>1722</S> the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S>.
And I<S>2504</S> saw<S>3708</S>, and<S>2532</S> bare record<S>3140</S> that<S>3754</S> this<S>3778</S> is<S>2076</S> the Son<S>5207</S> of God<S>2316</S>.
Again<S>3825</S> the next day after<S>1887</S> John<S>2491</S> stood<S>2476</S>, and<S>2532</S> two<S>1417</S> of<S>1537</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S>;
And<S>2532</S> looking upon<S>1689</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> as he walked<S>4043</S>, he saith<S>3004</S>, Behold<S>2396</S> the Lamb<S>286</S> of God<S>2316</S>!
And<S>2532</S> the two<S>1417</S> disciples<S>3101</S> heard<S>191</S> him<S>846</S> speak<S>2980</S>, and<S>2532</S> they followed<S>190</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>.
Then<S>1161</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> turned<S>4762</S>, and<S>2532</S> saw<S>2300</S> them<S>846</S> following<S>190</S>, and saith<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, What<S>5101</S> seek ye<S>2212</S>?<S>1161</S> They said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Rabbi<S>4461</S>, (which<S>3739</S> is to say<S>3004</S>, being interpreted<S>2059</S>, Master<S>1320</S>,) where<S>4226</S> dwellest thou<S>3306</S>?dwellest: or, abidest
He saith<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Come<S>2064</S> and<S>2532</S> see<S>1492</S>. They came<S>2064</S> and<S>2532</S> saw<S>1492</S> where<S>4226</S> he dwelt<S>3306</S>, and<S>2532</S> abode<S>3306</S> with<S>3844</S> him<S>846</S> that<S>1565</S> day<S>2250</S>: for<S>1161</S> it was<S>2258</S> about<S>5613</S> the tenth<S>1182</S> hour<S>5610</S>.about: that was two hours before night
One<S>1520</S> of<S>1537</S> the two<S>1417</S> which<S>3588</S> heard<S>191</S> <S>3844</S> John<S>2491</S> speak, and<S>2532</S> followed<S>190</S> him<S>846</S>, was<S>2258</S> Andrew<S>406</S>, Simon<S>4613</S> Peter's<S>4074</S> brother<S>80</S>.
He<S>3778</S> first<S>4413</S> findeth<S>2147</S> his own<S>2398</S> brother<S>80</S> Simon<S>4613</S>, and<S>2532</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, We have found<S>2147</S> the Messias<S>3323</S>, which<S>3739</S> is<S>2076</S>, being interpreted<S>3177</S>, the Christ<S>5547</S>. <sup>the Christ: or, the Anointed</sup>
And<S>2532</S> he brought<S>71</S> him<S>846</S> to<S>4314</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>. And<S>1161</S> when Jesus<S>2424</S> beheld<S>1689</S> him<S>846</S>, he said<S>2036</S>, Thou<S>4771</S> art<S>1488</S> Simon<S>4613</S> the son<S>5207</S> of Jona<S>2495</S>: thou<S>4771</S> shalt be called<S>2564</S> Cephas<S>2786</S>, which<S>3739</S> is by interpretation<S>2059</S>, A stone<S>4074</S>.
The day following<S>1887</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> would<S>2309</S> go forth<S>1831</S> into<S>1519</S> Galilee<S>1056</S>, and<S>2532</S> findeth<S>2147</S> Philip<S>5376</S>, and<S>2532</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Follow<S>190</S> me<S>3427</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> Philip<S>5376</S> was<S>2258</S> of<S>575</S> Bethsaida<S>966</S>, the city<S>4172</S> of<S>1537</S> Andrew<S>406</S> and<S>2532</S> Peter<S>4074</S>.
Philip<S>5376</S> findeth<S>2147</S> Nathanael<S>3482</S>, and<S>2532</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, We have found<S>2147</S> him, of whom<S>3739</S> Moses<S>3475</S> in<S>1722</S> the law<S>3551</S>, and<S>2532</S> the prophets<S>4396</S>, did write<S>1125</S>, Jesus<S>2424</S> of<S>575</S> Nazareth<S>3478</S>, the son<S>5207</S> of Joseph<S>2501</S>.
And<S>2532</S> Nathanael<S>3482</S> said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Can<S>1410</S> there any<S>5100</S> good thing<S>18</S> come<S>1511</S> out of<S>1537</S> Nazareth<S>3478</S>? Philip<S>5376</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Come<S>2064</S> and<S>2532</S> see<S>1492</S>.
Jesus<S>2424</S> saw<S>1492</S> Nathanael<S>3482</S> coming<S>2064</S> to<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> saith<S>3004</S> of<S>4012</S> him<S>846</S>, Behold<S>2396</S> an Israelite<S>2475</S> indeed<S>230</S>, in<S>1722</S> whom<S>3739</S> is<S>2076</S> no<S>3756</S> guile<S>1388</S>!
Nathanael<S>3482</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Whence<S>4159</S> knowest thou<S>1097</S> me<S>3165</S>? Jesus<S>2424</S> answered<S>611</S> and<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Before<S>4253</S> that Philip<S>5376</S> called<S>5455</S> thee<S>4571</S>, when thou wast<S>5607</S> under<S>5259</S> the fig tree<S>4808</S>, I saw<S>1492</S> thee<S>4571</S>.
Nathanael<S>3482</S> answered<S>611</S> and<S>2532</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Rabbi<S>4461</S>, thou<S>4771</S> art<S>1488</S> the Son<S>5207</S> of God<S>2316</S>; thou<S>4771</S> art<S>1488</S> the King<S>935</S> of Israel<S>2474</S>.
Jesus<S>2424</S> answered<S>611</S> and<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Because<S>3754</S> I said<S>2036</S> unto thee<S>4671</S>, I saw<S>1492</S> thee<S>4571</S> under<S>5270</S> the fig tree<S>4808</S>, believest thou<S>4100</S>? thou shalt see<S>3700</S> greater things<S>3187</S> than these<S>5130</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Verily<S>281</S>, verily<S>281</S>, I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, Hereafter<S>737</S> <S>575</S> ye shall see<S>3700</S> heaven<S>3772</S> open<S>455</S>, and<S>2532</S> the angels<S>32</S> of God<S>2316</S> ascending<S>305</S> and<S>2532</S> descending<S>2597</S> upon<S>1909</S> the Son<S>5207</S> of man<S>444</S>.
